item.title: [Go] Command Line Arguments
item.description: import "os" os.Args (type: []string) hold the command-line arguments, starting with the program name. Program name: os.Args[0] List of arguments: os.Args[1:] Number of arguments: len(os.Args[1:] Convert the argument from string to integer: import "strconv" num, err := strconv.Atoi(os.Args[1])
